help.description: Hi there! Thanks for checking out NodBot. NodBot is used in two distinct ways: with 'Slash Commands' (/help), and with 'Dot Commands' (nod.gif). The two types will be outlined below, along with usage examples.
help.slash: Slash Commands always begin with a / and a menu will pop up to help complete the commands.
help.dot: Dot Commands have the command at the end of the message, for example to search for a gif of 'nod', type 'nod.gif'
